column2: This table gives Attic inflectional endings. For declension in dialects other than Attic, see Appendix:Ancient Greek dialectal declension.

column1: ἀτοπία ‎(atopía)  ἄτοπος ‎(átopos)  ἐκτοπίζω ‎(ektopízō)  ἐκτοπισμός ‎(ektopismós)  ἔκτοπος ‎(éktopos)  ἐντοπίζω ‎(entopízō)
English: biotope  English: dystopia  English: isotope
column3: English: topography  English: toponymy  English: topos  English: utopia  German: Topos
